body.name: Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera 1080p Front Camera, Dash Camera for Cars Waterproof Rear camera, Car Camera Included 32GB SD Card, Dashboard Camera with Super Night Vision, Parking Monitor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 2 hrs 28 mins
features: 【1080P Front and Rear Dual Dash Cam】 Dual dash cam comes with a 170 wide-angle 1080P front camera and a VGA waterproof rear camera, this dash cam captures all two lanes of the road. 3 inch IPS Display of dashcam for cars that can shows the real-time image,the front camera captures the license plates and road signs clearly even at night, helps you see every details as clear as possible when playing back.

【32GB Memory Card Included】 This dash cam front and rear camera come with a high quality 32GB micro SD card, to make you use this dash camera smoothly, the SD card already inserted in dashcam.The 1080P dash cam support U1 or above high speed, 16GB-32GB micro SD card. You don't need to buy extra memory card. Get the dashcam for cars started!

【Car Charger with USB Interface】The dual dash cam front and rear camera uses Mini USB port, and the dash cam car charger with an USB interface, it's convenient that you can charging you smart phone/other device while using our dash cam. Please contact us for USB charging cable if you don't need the power card hookup instead of a cigarette lighter socket.

【Super Night Vision】 Car camera-dash cam front and rear equipped with high quality Sony Sensor to ensure full HD recording during the day and night. Car dashcams makes night shots brighter and prevents overexposure under strong light, obtains crystal-clear recording. So when you drive at night, it will be safer and more reliable with this front dashboard camera.

【Back up camera systems for car】Connect rear cam red wire cable to the positive terminal of car's reverse lamp, camera screen will show full screen rear view with assistant guide line when reverse the car. With this reverse camera, it helps to park the car easily and safely. Please note, NO NEED to connect the red wire cable if your car already HAS REVERSING SYSTEM DISPLAY MONITOR. Also the normal recording of rear camera won't be affected when the red wire cable is not connect to reverse lamp.

【Parking Mode】 If the car cameras parking monitor function is turned on and the car is hit or scratched, this dual dash cam for cars will automatically sense and record a short video. Locked videos will can't be overwritten by loop recording, saving your important files to avoid disputes.If you need dash camera for cars 7*24H parking monitor, please buy an extra hard wire kit to install the front and rear dash cam.

【Loop Recording& G-sensor Accident Lock】 When the SD card is full the 1080p dash cam will continue recording with its loop recording feature, this dash cams for car has built in G-sensor that saves video evidence of collisions when car is hit,the video will be automatically locked and retained without being overwritten. Or you can, by pressing the lock button, keep the video you want when dash camera for cars in recording.

【Easy Installation】This front cam is easy to install and operate with reference pictures in user manual. Install rear cam: (Method 1: Hide rear cam cable in car, adjust camera angle to get a suit lens obtain view and mark a position, then use screw to fix the it. Please connect the red wire to the positive of car reverse lamp. Method 2: Install rear cam on car’s rear windshield, adjust camera angle to get a suit lens obtain view, mark a position and use the 3M adhesive tape to stick it on.)

[Reliable Customer Care] We offer one year warranty including professional after-sales technical support who respond 24/7 online, car dash cam replacement parts or 30 days full refund. If you have any questions of this dashcam, please reach our customer service team.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dash Cam, Dashcams for Cars Full HD 1080P Car Camera Front with 32G SD Card Dash Cam Front with 32G SD Card, Penemay 1080P FHD Car Driving Recorder 3 inch IPS Display Screen, Car Camera with 170°Wide Angle, Aluminum Alloy Case, WDR G-Sensor, Parking Monitor, Loop Recording, Motion Detection Functions

This car dash camera supports dual-channel recording, allowing the dual dash cam to capture footage simultaneously from the front camera and rear camera. The rear camera supports mounting on above the license plates. Allow you to see and film what is happening behind your car even at night.

The night vision camera adopts with F1.8 super big aperture and unique WDR technology, the dash camera for car can provide brighter 1080P images even in low-light situations. The car dashcam can be an effective safe ensure better image quality and more natural details when driving at night.

Dual Dash Cam Parking Monitor This dash camera for cars works from the car camera's internal battery. The internal battery is designed for emergency recording and it's used to protect your car after parking. When detects collision, it will automatically turn on and record it. If use 24Hs parking monitor, hard wire kit is needed. Dashcams for Cars Gravity Sensor This car camera dash cam also with gravity sensor, when the variable sensitivity G-sensor detects a sudden shake/collision, the current video will be locked. Locked videos of this car camera for driver can't be overwritten by loop recording, saving your important files to avoid disputes.

Camaras Para Carros Loop Recording The dual dash cam for cars with loop recording, when the memory card is full, loop recording will automatically overwrite the oldest unlocked videos and make room for the new files. This front and rear dash camera supports up to 32GB storage (32GB card already insterted in dash cam). Camera for Car Backup Camera for Safe Parking The car camera dash cam come with a waterproof rear camera, which has 4 LED lights. Connect rear camera cable red wire to the positive terminal of car's reverse lamp, screen will show a full screen rear view with assistant guide line when reverse the car, it helps to park the car easily and safely.

Drive Cam Easy to Install Dash cam attach to the windshield with a suction cup mount, run wire of car dashcam car charger inside. Power car camera start to your journey. Insert SD Card of Dash Cam' Turn off dashcam, align the SD card gold contacts faces towards the front of dash cam lens side, push the card till the card clicks and stay in place. Rear Camera Extension Cable This 10ft extension rear cam cable is suitable for car total length not over 25ft. If your vehicle is longer, please buy an extra extension cable. 1080P Car Camera 1080P Dash cam+32GB SD Card+Rear Camera+16ft Rear Camera Cable+Suction Cups+11ft Car Charger+Mini Data Cable+User Manual+Card Removal Tool

With our 1080PFHD dual dash camera front and rear, you can capture every moment of your journey in stunning detail. Here are some WARM TIPS FOR THIS DUAL DASH CAM FOR CARS FRONT AND REAR CMAERA: 32GB SD card is Included in the dual dash cam. Please Format SD Card on dual dash cam front and rear camera firstly, find the option of “Format” in dashcam system setting and click “OK” button to confirm. If need to buy extra SD card, the dash cam for cars Max Support 32GB SD card, we recommend: U1 or above high speed, 16GB-32GB micro SD card. Please remain plugged in while using car camera dash camera for cars. Please always keep using the original power cord plugged into your car's cigarette lighter socket. The dash cam internal battery which used to save the emergency videos. This dash camera for cars works from the car camera's internal battery. The dash camera's internal battery is designed for emergency recording and save settings. Screen Saver Function. If you want dash cams screen off but dash cam still keep recording, just choose "screensaver” option in system setting, dashcam will keep recording as normal. Front and rear dash cam with 1080P front lens observing road front, waterproof rear lens observing behind of your car. Motion Detection Function. To ensure seamless video recording, please kindly turn off “motion detection” of this dash camera while driving. Dash cam car camera will capture a clear and vivid picture footage by carefully fine-tuning the exposure even in low-light night condition.It will be safer and more reliable with this front and rear camera for cars. Remove protective film of dual dash cam display screen and lens. Please take off the protective film of the car camera dash cam front and rear lens and screen to ensure that the video is clearly displayed. The dual dash cam for cars captures clearly capturing license plates and road signs.When the car starts up, both front and rear camera record simultaneously, provide all-around protection to your car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to installed and set up
reviews.reviewText: To begin with I'm 75 years old and not a tech savvy. I was scared to install it by myself, but I gave it a try. I was amazed to find out how easy it was to installed and set it up. It conveniently comes with a rear camera too and it's small enough not to interfere with my front or rear view of the road. Pictures are really clear. A great value for the price.I have it for a few months and still working without a problem. Love this dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: This Dash Cam came in very handy within the first month of having it. I love being able to record in front or in the back at all times. Very easy to use and I would recommend it to anybody looking for good camera for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great video quality
reviews.reviewText: Easy to connect to your vehicle. Great video quality and good battery life. Dashcam has great video and picture quality. I love that it comes with the SD card included. It's worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality video. As for easy to install, front cam not to bad depends on how well you want to hide the cable. Rear cam a different story. I have a Toyota Tacoma, so I chose to mount the camera on the back window, didn't feel like spending a lot of time under the truck besides there is a backup camera installed already. I ran the cable from the rear cam under the plastic floor panels on the door frame. Front cam, tucked the cables into the space between the window and roof then down the door frame (another plastic panel) and behind the glove compartment. only 2 complaints, in the description of included parts some paragraphs state a 64 gig SD card included (not a big deal). Bigger deal: included is a second suction cup for the back cam. There was no way I could see to attach the rear cam to the suction cup.I had to drill out the mounting plate on the rear cam a little then attach with a small nut, the thumbscrew would not fit. Overall, a good deal for $50.00

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dashcam has great video and picture quality. I love that it comes with the SD card included. It's worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is excellent. Previous I bought a few different Dashcam Falcon 360s, and others were not qualified. I am very happy with that one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Easy to Set up
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera. So Easy to set up! I had it installed in less than 20 minutes. The video quality is great.

reviews.reviewTitle: works really good ,picture quality is great
reviews.reviewText: I did not want to spend too much so i gave it a try but it came really good .its a great deal picture quality is good and installation is also very easy.Its easy to use and operate .It has front and back camera .It has memory card too .I hight recommend this product if you are looking for something budget friendly and a good product.
I love the picture quality, even at night. Very handy and useful product. Value for money.
I got this to give as a Christmas present, the person loves it! This has a really good picture quality and was easy to set up for an awesome price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well, better unit than I'd expect at this $$ point.
reviews.reviewText: My only real 'issue' is the attachment point to the windshield suction cup bracket.. its a small screw on thread, so if you want to detach the camera you have to physically unscrew the unit and be very careful not to drop it as it comes off the last thread. Or you can release the suction cup from the glass, but I prefer to leave the mount in place. A clip/slide on style would be better here in my opinion.Otherwise, it functions as it should. I'm happy with the video quality and even the sound it picks up inside the passenger cabin. Unit is mostly user friendly, and I had no issues with install and initial setup. You simply run a wire, plug it in, follow instructions to format the included memory card, and it's working. Even plugging into a pc was simple; it was recognized right away as a usb mass storage unit, and I can easily save/view the video clips onto my computer.One thing to note, I haven't installed the rear cam yet, but I had to order an extension cable separately for that because I drive a full cab/long box truck and the wires it comes with are not nearly long enough to get to the back.Good product overall, works great, well worth the money.

Product was easy to set up and works as advertised. My last dashcam (which costs twice as much as this one) showed a totally black screen at night whereas this one lights up like it’s daytime. Very impressive!
